title: Chicago Script is now available at myfonts!
content:

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20150414191331im_/http:/typophile.com/files/Chicago-script-4_3906.png)

Chicago Script by Borges Lettering  
A beautifully drawn period style font that is great for logos!  
Now on sale at Myfonts!  
 [http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/letterheadfonts/lhf-chicago-script/](http://web.archive.org/web/20150414191331/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/letterheadfonts/lhf-chicago-script/ "http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/letterheadfonts/lhf-chicago-script/")

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20150414191331im_/http:/typophile.com/files/alternates_6133.png)
  
Images 2 & 3 provided by [http://originaledesigns.com/](http://web.archive.org/web/20150414191331/http:/originaledesigns.com/ "http://originaledesigns.com/")
